com.hbm.devices.scan.announce

Class ServiceEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hbm.devices.scan.announce.ServiceEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class ServiceEntry
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The optional service might be used to deliver the IP port under which the client can reach different services on the device. So devices might e.g. specify how to connect to the data acquisition service. The content of the service is totally device specific and not specified in this document.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
